comments.html:
I would replace 'American' with 'Marketing-Engineers' and 'Eastern-Europeans' with 'Experienced-Engineers';)

I am also from 'EE' region and when I come across new technology I start googling for 'x drawbacks':) Not because I am pessimist or negative but because I'll responsible for supporting/maintaining x stuff.

Ivan, keep at it!
comments.name: Bogdan Golab

comments.html: You could also replace the word "negative" with "pragmatic". Honestly, reading about new technologies on your blog often can be a bummer, but, I, like all your other fans, rely on your pragmatic approach to describing new technologies, and continue to be avid supporter of your efforts year after year. I'd second Bogdan above and also say, Ivan, keep at it! Me and my job is very much reliant on you! :)
comments.name: Salman Naqvi

comments.html: what a great explanation Ivan! respect!! :-)
